EmailTemplate.name: CH 3monthExpiry Transaction
EmailTemplate.subject: Request to close {!Transaction__c. CompanyName__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Companies House
Request to close {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}
{!Transaction__c.PresenterName__c},
The Request to close {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c} has not been completed and will be deleted on {!Today()+30} .
The status of the directors signing is located at the following link: {!Transaction__c.SignerStatus__c}
What happens next
To avoid the request being deleted, it's important that you ask those who have not approved to approve this request before {!Today()+30}.
Your reference number is FE{!Transaction__c.Id}. You'll need to quote this if you contact us about your request.
This is an automated email, please do not reply. Forward any enquiries to the following: Email: enquiries@companieshouse.gov.uk Service Desk: +44 (0)303 1234 500
